تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Ava,

 

Thank you for your email.

 

I wanted to introduce myself to you as I have recently joined Bawabat Al-Sharq Mall as a Leasing Executive. I'm very excited to be a part of this journey and to be a part of the team.

 

To ensure we are providing you with the best service, kindly take a moment to help us update your information in our system and provide us with the following Documents:

To ensure we are providing you with the best service, kindly take a moment to help us update your information in our system and provide us with the following Documents:

 

1.	Property Insurance
2.	Civil Defence Certificate

 

Please check and provide us with the required at your earliest convenience, and please let me know if you have any questions regarding the same.

 

Best Regards,

 

Alanoud Jarrar

Leasing Executive
